content:
Is there any specific reason to have address field as 0..1 for Plan net Network whereas the same field's cardinality is 0..* for Organization (Plan Net Organization & Base). Screenshot attached.

~Aritra

Network_address.PNG Organization_address.PNG

@Aritra Kundu
Most of these cardinality constraints followed VhDir. In VhDir Network it is 0..*. Seem like it might have been an unnecessary constraint.
If it is problematic for your use case, please add a jira tracker. Thx!

@Robert Dieterle

Saul Kravitz said:

Aritra Kundu
Most of these cardinality constraints followed VhDir. In VhDir Network it is 0..*. Seem like it might have been an unnecessary constraint.
If it is problematic for your use case, please add a jira tracker. Thx!

Robert Dieterle

Thank you.. Could you please help me with the Jira tracker link.

Regards,
Aritra
